text: Let's talk about sex, baby! 💘🤷‍♂️ Siouxland District Health Department is on a mission to educate our community on STI preventative care. 💪🏽🧬 Did you know that Woodbury County and our region have higher rates of sexually transmitted infections? 🤯👀 It's time to take action! 💪🏽💕 Follow the link to make an appointment and get free treatment plans. 📆👨‍⚖️ And, you can even score free condoms in the lobby of the Siouxland Health Department. 😉👍 Let's work together to reduce the incidence of STIs. 💕🌈
